QueryResult.text: SELECT hn.id hierarchy_node_key, hn.id clarity_hierarchy_node_key, hn.hierarchy_id hierarchy_key, hn.code hierarchy_node_id, hn.sequence hierarchy_sequence, hn.parent_sequence hierarchy_parent_sequence, hn.lvl node_level, hn.nnb_sequence, hn.object_code object_code_key, hn.instance_id investment_key, hn.created_date clarity_created_date, cb.id created_by_key, cb.full_name created_by, hn.last_updated_date clarity_updated_date, ub.id updated_by_key, ub.full_name updated_by FROM odf_hierarchy_nodes hn LEFT OUTER JOIN srm_resources cb ON hn.created_by = cb.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN srm_resources ub ON hn.last_updated_by = ub.user_id
